review: Did not work. Set up and it was going haywire. Select Netflix; amazon prime window opens up. Select videos; it reverts to home screen. Hit home screen button; music window opens...so on and so forth. Would not recommend
author: Peter Libera

review: We love the Amazon Fire TV stick! We will be ordering the MLB package with it. Yeah! Thanks Amazon now we can stream!
author: Katherine Foster

review: These are great little units. You can plug it into the tvs usb port for power. The remote is RF so no worries about position. There are apps you can download for DLNA access and with Prime you can store pictures and watch them on the fire stick. I have 3 of them now, turns a dumb tv into smart tv.
author: Troy Jackson "Scorpio"

review: I could not afford the prime payment all at once but yes I love the Stick. I have Netflix  and Hulu and it work flawless. 100% satasfied . Tried the other stick and had problems connecting and I could never get help from the customer service. RUKU? TOOK IT BACK bought Amazon fire stick No issues. Also with RUKU all my billing had to go through them didn't like that.
author: Michael Osborne

review: Great device! Quick and easy setup and connection to WiFi. Should have bought this z long time ago!
author: R
